title: Why does it seem like V and Jungkook are gay? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll give you one answer. It’s because they’re Korean. Now, this may seem strange, but Koreans actually tend to be very touchy with another if they are close, family, friends, or in a relationship. Don’t get your hopes up with the last one. Jungkook has said many times that he thinks of Taehyung as an older brother. I get extremely offended - although I shouldn’t - when I see Instagram accounts and Youtube accounts dedicating their time trying to prove that two men are in love - to the point of photo-shopping pictures to make it seem like JK has hickeys on his neck. Imagine if you were hugging your friend and people started making ship accounts for you and taking pictures of everything you did with your friend, and disregarding the circumstances. It seems like those accounts are so desperate to prove something that ultimately causes rumors for BTS. I used to be a big shipper of Taekook, despite my current stance on them. I think it’s mostly younger/newer ARMYs who ship any couples, as when I shipped them I was about 14 to 16. It’s been 2 years since then, and I’ve also realized that: If they did come out, they would lose MANY, MANY, fans. Why, you may ask? Well, it’s mostly because of Korea’s opinions on anything that isn’t straight. I myself live in Korea and I have seen many homeless women and men who were disowned because they came out to their parents, not to speak bad about my homeland. I’m perfectly fine with you being whoever, whatever you want (I myself am Pansexual but that really doesn’t matter). Fans would lose interest if they came out, mostly because many fans, Korean or International, only lust for the members. But I think, if they ever DID truly come out, we should support them and their choices.

For a band which has been together and lived together for seven years of their lives, they’re bound to be tighter even in public than what society believes as “straight.” Jungkook, being the youngest or the maknae, is loved and cared for by all six other hyungs who love to baby him and spoil him, so this unrestrained affectionate showing of love may lead to rumors regarding their sexuality. Furthermore, Jungkook has said multiple times that he is closest to Tae, and he truly regards Tae as his older brother. Jungkook DOES have an older brother in real life, but being separated from him and his family at the age of 15 to live with other boys must have been extremely frightening for him. Add on top of the fact that he still is extremely shy to begin with, and you get small Jungkook in an introverted shell. If you’ve been an ARMY for a long time, you’ll know that Jungkook was so shy he wouldn’t shower until everyone else had gone to bed. But Tae, with his cheerful attitude and hyper personality, was the first one to get through Jungkook’s shy personality and bring out the golden maknae we know today who is unafraid to bully Jin and make the lives of the rest of them a living hell (they’re literally so afraid of this muscle pig he even said he loves his thighs I’m screeching). Undoubtedly, Jungkook would naturally be closer with Tae and be much more comfortable around him. It’s best not to spread any rumors about them being in a relationship unless BigHit or BTS themselves have confirmed it. But with their handshake, their jealous behaviors when the other’s attention has been taken away, the things they share in common, and everything else in between, who knows?
